features: A POWERFUL DEODORANT THAT ACTUALLY WORKS: Our incredibly effective odor-preventing formula goes way beyond being aluminum-free. With tons of awards and thousands of raving fans, we've set a new bar for what you should expect from a deodorant.

GOES ON CLEAR + WON'T CAUSE PIT STAINS: Unlike most deodorants, ours goes on clear so you WON'T get white marks on clothes. It’s non-sticky and dries quickly. No aluminum means no more dark or yellow pit stains on your shirts. It’s a game changer.

ASPEN AIR SCENT: Let yourself be transported to the cool mountain air of the Aspen trails with this sophisticated scent. Our Aspen Air deodorant has notes of cedarwood, pine and oakmoss meet frosted citrus and a hint of wildflowers for a scent as seductive as Aspen itself. This fragrance contains 17 essential oils.

PREMIUM, GOOD-FOR-YOU INGREDIENTS: We thoughtfully curate each ingredient to keep you dry and smelling fresh. They're vegan, animal cruelty-free and dermatologist-tested. We never use aluminum, alcohol, parabens, phthalates or talc.
body.description: Our incredibly effective odor-preventing formula goes way beyond being aluminum-free. Named by Men's Health as Editor's Choice, it goes on clear and non-sticky, dries quickly and won't leave pit stains on your light shirts. Absorbs moisture while reducing friction and inflammation that comes from movement. Rich in antioxidants to shield your skin from irritation. Our formula is Alcohol-free, Aluminum-free, Glycol-free, Paraben-free, Phthalate-free, Sulfate-free and Gluten-Free. Vegan and Animal Cruelty-free.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What To Expect When You Switch From Anti-Perspirant To Natural Deodorant No odor Sweating More Your pits are purging toxins from aluminum in antiperspirant. Smell Less You’ll sweat more and smell less as your body continues to adjust. No odor or sweat Odor and sweat begin to disappear.* *Everyone detoxes at their own pace. For optimal results, reapply as needed.

Aluminum Free Deodorant Body Wash Oars Bar Alps Bar Hand Cream SPF 50 Spray Benefits Goes on clear and won't cause pit stains. Free of aluminum, alcohol and baking soda. Packed with Antioxidants and Vitamin E to intensely moisturize your skin. Purge skin of dead skin cells, sweat, bacteria, and excess oil with exfoliating Blue Charcoal, Volcanic Sand and Blue Green Algae. Packed with powerful natural ingredients to provide intense hydration for dry and dehydrated skin Crafted with 20% Shea Butter and vitamin-packed Coconut and Sunflower oils to deeply hydrate and heal dry hands. Moisturizing and non-greasy. Light, non-greasy and reff friendly formula infused with Vitamin C to strengthen, hydrate and brighten your skin while protecting you from harmful UV rays Key Ingredients Aloe Vera, Alpine Caribou Moss, and Corn Starch Aloe Vera, Jojoba Oil, and Vitamin E Shea Butter, Witch Hazel Extract, Alpine Caribou Moss, Volcanic Sand, Blue Green Algae, and Activated Charcoal Shea Butter, Alpine Caribou Moss, Juniper Berries, Rainforest Certified Palm Oil Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, Sunflower Oil, and Alpine Caribou Moss Vitamin C, Alpine Caribou Moss, and Olive Leaf Extract Application Apply to underarms as needed Apply a quarter-size amount of product to hand or loofah. Apply to wet skin. Rinse completely. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long lasting, great smell, all natural. Sound like an ad? Well its true in this case.
reviews.reviewText: Oars + Alps really does make deodorant that actually meets the claims that the big companies like to make. Wife approved (it was a birthday gift). She bought it for me because I was tired of using a big brand deodorant and wanted something a little unique.The scent:"Aspen Air" is my favorite scent of all of the Oars+Alps scents. It is very light, and airy but not floral and doesn't smell like laundry detergent. Deodorant is often to overpowering, like it's trying to double as cologne. This has a crisp, airy and sweet smell that's very light. It's only pungent as you apply it, and really it isn't that strong then either. As you go throughout the day the smell is there but only subtly. I've received compliments on the smell from men and women alike.The shape:This deodorant stick reminds me of the original Old Spice deodorant sticks. It's actually quite nice to hold. While it doesn't have the oval shape that makes it convenient for application across your pit, the circular shape is a nice throwback and welcome feel in the hand.I don't know how to say this without being subjective. This deodorant feels natural. I've used Speed Stick and Old Spice for years but they always felt... manufactured or man-made if you will. The smell, texture and feel of this deodorant comes across as though its made by someone churning plant based ingredients in a wooden bowl rather than a bunch of chemicals boiled in a giant metal vat. I dont know how to explain it but this stuff just "feels" better.It won't stop you from sweating. It's not anti-perspirant. IMHO I don't think it's smart to stop your body's important functions (like sweating). On days that I sweat heavily I don't smell if I use this. In fact I can apply in the morning, spend all day sweating doing yard work outside and then get in a 30min workout in the afternoon and still not smell nasty. Although at that point the nice Aspen Air scent is gone.Safe to say this stuff does its job. And it does it well. If your looking for an outside of the box brand and something more natural.. this is it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't stain my shirts and smells great!
reviews.reviewText: This is the only deodorant I've bought for the last year. After years of having my arm pits of my favorite shirts start to grey, I researched an aluminum free deodorant as the solution and it worked! I had been using like a mainstream deodorant for years and ruined a number of shirts. This stuff smells great, lasts all day and never stains! An entire year and no stains in my arm pits. I'll never go back to anything else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Been using aluminum free deodorant for about 4 months now, when I started I bought 5 different brands and rotate them to find a favorite. My notes:1. Oar and Alps Ocean scent - best smelling by far, really like this light clean scent. Downside is it's one of the weaker deoderants and requires a mid day refresher. 4/52. A&H Essentials Juniper Berry - seemed to be the cheaper, stock and standard and that's what it's become. Scent is light and inoffensive. Can just last a regular office day but not anything harder. 4/53. Huron citrus - stronger clean scent, like it a lot. Rolls on with white residue and while I haven't noticed stains on cloths I'm wary to use with anything dark. 3.5/54. Lume Tangerine and Powder - the tangerine is the most offputting scent out off everything, the powder isn't bad but a bit strong for a powder. While the scents are a bit disappointing Lume is by far the best controlling sweat and smell in both effectiveness and duration. Hate the deoderants roll on bottle, hard to control how much cream comes out, just go for the tube. 4.5/5, could be 5/5 with better selection and execution of scents. My overall winner and most used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my husband bc he was getting an allergic reaction to all other deodorants that we tried. This is one of the two (the other is now discontinued) that doesn’t make his armpits sunburn red or itchy! It’s free all all harmful things including aluminum and alcohol! And it smells great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars For my body chemistry this was not a good option did not last long but smells good
reviews.reviewText: This may work differently for someone with a different body chemistry but for me it did not work well I had to re-apply it multiple times a day and still found myself smelling badly. This is just one natural deodorant and a long list of natural deodorants that I have tried most of them do not work well and I do like the smell of this one but again did not work for me. The one that worked best for me was bravo Sierra brand deodorant, the ones that smelled best to me were Schmitz brand deodorant. But everybody’s body chemistry is different and before I switched to natural deodorants a few years ago I used to use the clinical strength stuff so I may not be a good example for someone who is just an average under arm sweater. No natural deodorant stops you from sweating but if you find a good one that works with your body chemistry it will stop you from stinking so this may work for you but did not for me. I found myself having to clean my armpits with a little vinegar in the middle of the day and reapplying the deodorant otherwise even reapplying did not help. The bravo Sierra brand I only had to apply once during the day and it holds throughout even during workouts. The Schmidt‘s brand smells better to me but I do not like the texture of it, the bravo Ciara brand is much smoother application. This brand of deodorant has a pretty smooth application so I did like that I also like the container it comes in so those are the pros but again I did not like how it worked for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars No aluminum but you get other bad stuff
reviews.reviewText: I bought this product looking for healthy options, mainly no aluminum which has been found to be bad when used on deodorants. I tried this product for a time, and even when it doesn’t protect that long for me and it’s not cheap, I kept buying it because I thought it was healthy. I recently scanned the product with the Yuka app and it was rated BAD (see screenshot) for your health; I requested a review and they confirmed that there was no mistake on their ratings. So I had to throw away my deodorant and cancel my subscription.
Doesn’t last as long as anti-perspirants.
It was worth the wait now I smell great.
The smell is so good. Barely have mark on the clothes
Product works well. Just a bit pricy in my opinion. Would purchase again.
